translations: v.为……提供住宿；容纳，提供空间；考虑到，顾及；顺应，适应；帮助（某人），向……施以援手；迎合，迁就；调解

sentences.sentence: I needed to accommodate to the new schedule.
sentences.translation: 我需要适应新的时间表。

sentences.sentence: There is usually room to accommodate up to 80 visitors.
sentences.translation: 通常可以多能容纳80名来宾。

sentences.sentence: The school was not big enough to accommodate all the children.
sentences.translation: 学校没有足够的地方容纳所有的学生。
